introHeadlinePrefix: Are you ready for a revolution in the logistics industry?
introDescription: Logisity is a peer-to-peer doorstep-to-doorstep app designed to simplify sending and receiving packages between people, whether for short or long distances.
step3: Install even if you are presented with a warning, it's a secured app
logisityAppDescription: Book and track deliveries with ease.
logisityPartnerDescription: Join our network to offer logistics services.
contactDescription: Have questions, feedback, or just want to chat? Reach out to us!
contactErrorMessage: Failed to send message. Try again.
privacyWarning: Logisty ("we," "us," or "the Platform") is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of our users in accordance with Organic Law No. 2004-63. This notice explains how we collect, process, and protect your data.
dataControllerDesc: The data controller for this experimental phase is Logisty Platforms. For any questions regarding your data, contact us through the official support channels provided in the App.
dataWeCollectDesc: We only collect data that is strictly necessary for the operation of the logistics service:
identData: Identification Data: Name, email address, and profile information via Google Sign-In.
contactData: Contact Data: Phone numbers of Senders and Receivers to facilitate delivery.
locationData: Location Data: Real-time GPS coordinates of Partners (Drivers) during active delivery tasks to ensure the security of the goods and calculate routes.
transactData: Transaction Data: Details of the delivery (package description), timestamps of QR code scans, and proof of commission payments (D17/RIB/Flouci screenshots).
consentDesc: By clicking "I Accept" or by logging into the Logisty Apps via Google, you provide your explicit consent for the collection and processing of your personal data as described in this notice.
purposeOfProcessingDesc: Your data is processed for the following specific purposes: service execution, security tracking via QR codes, financial management of commissions, and fraud prevention through task verification.
dataRecipientsDesc: Your data is only shared with parties involved in the delivery: Partners see delivery details, and Clients see live Partner location. We do not share data with third parties for marketing purposes.
storageAndSecurityDesc: Your data is stored securely for the duration of this experimental phase using technical measures like encrypted sign-in and secure database rules.
yourRightsDesc: Under Tunisian law, you have the right of access, rectification, opposition, and deletion of your personal data once all outstanding transactions are settled.
clientTermsWarning: PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY. BY USING THE LOGISTY APP, YOU AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE, DO NOT USE THE SERVICE.
experimentalNatureDesc: Logisty is currently in an experimental "Beta" phase. You acknowledge that the application may contain bugs, errors, or service interruptions.
preIncStatusDesc: The service is operated as a proof-of-concept. By using the app, you agree that you use it at your own risk.
platformOnlyDesc: Logisty is a technology platform that connects users who need to send packages ("Senders") with users who wish to receive them ("Receivers") via independent third-party transporters ("Partners").
noCarrierDesc: Logisty is not a logistics company, a courier service, or a common carrier. We do not transport goods ourselves.
indContractorsDesc: All Partners are independent freelance transporters and are not employees, agents, or representatives of Logisty.
googleSignInDesc: Users must register using a valid Google Account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
dataAccuracyDesc: You must provide accurate names and locations. False identity or location information may result in an immediate ban.
prohibitedItemsDesc: Users are strictly prohibited from sending or receiving the following via Logisty:
itemCash: Large sums of cash, jewelry, or high-value negotiable instruments.
itemLaw: Any item prohibited under Tunisian Law.
refusalRight: Logisty and the Partner reserve the right to refuse any package if it is suspected to contain prohibited items.
pickupQrDesc: The Sender must present a unique QR code to the Partner at the time of pickup.
deliveryQrDesc: The Receiver must present a unique QR code to the Partner at the time of delivery.
liabilityTransferDesc: Logisty is not liable for damages. Liability for the item resides with the Partner from the moment of the Pickup scan until the Delivery scan.
codDesc: The total delivery fee must be paid in Cash by the Receiver directly to the Partner upon arrival.
pricingDesc: Delivery prices are estimated by the App.
refusalPaymentDesc: If a Receiver refuses to pay, the package will be returned to the Sender at the Sender's expense, and accounts may be suspended.
asIsDesc: Logisty provides the platform "as-is" and "as available."
damageLossDesc: Logisty shall not be liable for any loss of goods, damage to items, or delays in delivery.
abuseDesc: Harassment of Partners or fraudulent bookings will result in a permanent ban.
bypassingDesc: Coordinating deliveries outside of the App found through Logisty results in account suspension.
govLawDesc: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Tunisia. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Tunisia.
partnerTermsWarning: THIS IS A LEGALLY BINDING AGREEMENT. BY REGISTERING AS A PARTNER, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU ARE AN INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR AND NOT AN EMPLOYEE OF LOGISTY.
nonEmploymentDesc: You are a third-party freelance transporter ("Partner"). You are not an employee, agent, or representative of Logisty.
autonomyDesc: You determine when you log in and which tasks you accept. Logisty does not control your working hours.
equipmentDesc: You are responsible for your own vehicle, fuel, smartphone, and data connection.
partnerGoogleSignInDesc: Partners must register using a valid Google Account.
partnerAccuracyDesc: Fake identity or fraudulent vehicle information will result in an immediate permanent ban.
partnerPickupDesc: You must scan the Sender’s QR Code at pickup to confirm custody.
partnerDeliveryDesc: Scanning the Receiver’s QR Code at drop-off is the only proof of completion.
partnerCashDesc: You are responsible for collecting 100% of the delivery fee in cash from the Receiver.
investigationPolicyDesc: Logisty conducts investigations for tasks aborted after pickup.
toleratedCircDesc: Bans will not be issued for documented accidents or emergencies.
permBanDesc: Theft or intentional misconduct results in a permanent ban.
commissionRateDesc: Logisty is entitled to a 20% service fee on every delivery.
paymentMethodsDesc: You must remit commission via RIB, D17, Flouci, or authorized agent.
cashAgent: Cash to an Authorized Logisty Agent
frequencyDesc: You may pay your commission balance Daily or Weekly.
lockOutRuleDesc: Accounts automatically lock if the commission balance exceeds the safety limit.
platformIntegrityDesc: Taking client details for deliveries outside the app is strictly prohibited.
partnerSafetyDesc: Handle packages with care. Harassment leads to an immediate investigation.
taxLiabilityDesc: Partners are solely responsible for their own tax and social security contributions.
vehicleInsuranceDesc: You must maintain valid vehicle insurance. Logisty is not liable for accidents.
rightSuspendDesc: Logisty reserves the right to terminate accounts for violations or non-payment.
updatesDesc: Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
partnerGovLawDesc: This agreement is governed by the laws of the Republic of Tunisia.
